text:
@realDonaldTrump You also have little doubt -

Mexico will pay for the wall. 

you can trust Russia

China will honor their agreements

kids want to leave parents to live in a cage

COVID19 is the flu

it’s ok to stare into an eclipse 

Melania married you for your intellect

You were saying?
